data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zu, Guo-Hao, Li, Cheng-De (2015): Description of three new species and new distributional data for four species of Anagyrus (Hymenoptera: Encyrtidae) from China. Zootaxa 4028 (2): 257-273, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4028.2.6
